channel.title: -| Eternal PvM 742 | Achievements | Dungeoneering | Professional Website |-
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9RieHhV.png[/img]
[IMG]http://eternalpvm.netii.net/forums/images/portal.png[/img][URL=http://"http://eternalpvm.netii.net"]Home[/URL] [IMG]http://eternalpvm.netii.net/forums/images/forumicon.png[/img][URL=http://"http://eternalpvm.netii.net/forums/"]Forums[/URL] [IMG]http://eternalpvm.netii.net/forums/images/attack.gif[/img][URL=http://"http://eternalpvm.netii.net/playnow.html"]Play Now[/URL] [IMG]http://eternalpvm.netii.net/forums/images/voteicon.gif[/img][URL=http://"http://eternal.runetoplist.com/vote"]Vote[/URL][/CENTER]
[B][CENTER][U][SIZE=4]Staff[/SIZE][/U][/CENTER]
[CENTER]Owner/Developer - Alex Owner/Developer - Majestic Global Administrator - N/A Global Moderator - N/A Global Moderator - N/A Support Leader - Ima_Pure_At Support - N/A Support - N/A GFX Artist - N/A[/CENTER]
[B][CENTER][U][SIZE=4]Why choose us?[/SIZE][/U][/CENTER]
Eternal PvM have possibly the most hard working and reliable development team that any server could have, getting out an update package each day (With Alex currently on his Exam Weeks and Majestic without Source access yet). As of 04/06/2014, Eternal PvM has been Online for two full days, registering over 30 players. Eternal PvM doesn't have your average developers who will spend half of their time sat at home, staring at the screen waiting for a new player, but a development team who work tirelessly to improve the game experience for everyone. I'm sure you can tell that by our website being fully functioning with intergrated voting and donating pages. I'd highly recommend that before you skip to the next thread, you read over the server features and take a look at what we have to pack a punch for the public! We're also VPS Hosted on a 8GB VPS so you can play whenever you like or 24/7 without the worry of being disconnected!
[B][CENTER][U][SIZE=4]Server Features[/SIZE][/U][/CENTER]
Fully working (and our own custom) Dungeoneering in Deamonheim with our own interface! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xOt3DhS.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Ziv6gHv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mNr66iy.png[/img]
Effective Title + Achievements System [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lOV47wW.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/h5O4JGl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HauZqnp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OcQt88k.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ex11Wxz.png[/img]

Tormented Demons [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/X41jk01.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NfmtqLX.png[/img]
Zombie Onslaught [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/E7iZGxe.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Iu7uyCB.png[/img]
Yk'Lagor the Thunderous (World Boss Queue) [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WgqQ9iB.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ay3X3cH.png[/img]

[B][CENTER][U][SIZE=4]Why choose us?[/SIZE][/U][/CENTER]

Eternal PvM have possibly the most hard working and reliable development team that any server could have, getting out an update package each day (With Alex currently on his Exam Weeks and Majestic without Source access yet). As of 04/06/2014, Eternal PvM has been Online for two full days, registering over 30 players. Eternal PvM doesn’t have your average developers who will spend half of their time sat at home, staring at the screen waiting for a new player, but a development team who work tirelessly to improve the game experience for everyone. I’m sure you can tell that by our website being fully functioning with intergrated voting and donating pages. We’re also VPS Hosted on a 8GB VPS so you can play whenever you like or 24/7 without the worry of being disconnected!
